file.name: SelectionViewModel.cs
file.note: Modified ProcessPage() to clear the selections after printing the product.

release_notes.release: These release were bug fixes during UTA. 1.0.5 was the first release to go into production.

file.name: app.config
file.note: The settings for PathCommand were set for User instead of Application. Changed to Application.

file.name: Repository.cs
file.note: Modify all access functions to exclude the fields removed in the database

file.name: Database
file.note: Remove field NO_USINE from USINE table as requested by Manon
Remove field NO_LIGNE from LIGNE table as requested by Manon
Remove field NO_TEMPLATE from TEMPLATE table as requested by Manon
Modified fields NO_TEMPLATE_# TO ID_TEMPLATE_# on ETIQUETTE table as NO_TEMPLATE was removed from TEMPLATE table
Added field ID_LIGNE to ETIQUETTE table as per Manon. This field is not used in the application
